imdb.plot outline: After the failure of Mico in becoming a chef or even close to a chef in 2 seasons of Oklat Mco, the show decided to become Gawlat and Oklat Mico. In this new series we will follow Mico around the globe. Mico will take up new challenges and this time it will not be just food. Mico will have to challenge the difficulties of travelling, learn and share.
imdb.title: Gawlat Oklat Mico
plot: After the failure of Mico in becoming a chef or even close to a chef in 2 seasons of Oklat Mco, the show decided to become Gawlat and Oklat Mico. In this new series we will follow Mico around the globe. Mico will take up new challenges and this time it will not be just food. Mico will have to challenge the difficulties of travelling, learn and share.::Hazem Akkila
